model.name: Simple IOR 0.3.0.3 & Build System 0.3.0.3 - Dependency-Free Architecture
model.description: Create simple, fundamental, dependency-free IOR 0.3.0.3 component. IOR knows nothing about environment - ONCE creates environment-aware IORs. Create dependency-free Build 0.3.0.3 for seamless ONCE building. Restore once deinstall with Web4 compliance.
model.rationale: Circular dependencies prevent ecosystem building. Simple IOR with no environment knowledge enables dependency-free architecture. ONCE handles environment context. Build system must enable seamless once shell script execution.
acceptance_criteria: IOR knows nothing about environment (no ONCE references)
ONCE/0.3.0.2 modified to use simple IOR 0.3.0.3
ONCE creates environment-aware IORs using fundamental IOR
Resolve circular dependency between IOR and ONCE
Create Build/0.3.0.3 - dependency-free, can build ONCE
Restore once deinstall functionality with Web4 compliance
Enable seamless once shell script execution with build system

ior_simplification.scope: No environment knowledge, no ONCE references
ior_simplification.usage: ONCE uses IOR to create environment-aware instances

build_system.scope: Build ONCE and other components seamlessly
build_system.integration: Works with once shell script for seamless execution

dependency_resolution.solution: Simple IOR with no environment knowledge
dependency_resolution.result: ONCE uses IOR, IOR doesn't know about ONCE

technical_details.once_integration: Uses simple IOR to create environment-aware instances

model.implementation_notes: This breaks circular dependencies by making IOR fundamental and environment-agnostic, while ONCE handles environment context.
